Step Forward
From The Challenge: A great opportunity
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
This time last year, you were about to complete NCS with The Challenge.
We imagine a lot has changed for you since then, and things are unlikely to slow down over the next year.
So whilst you’re probably excited about finishing school or college, you may also be anxious about what decisions to make about your future. It can be hard deciding which route is best for you.
That’s why we want to tell you about a great opportunity called Step Forward. It’s your chance to discover the path that’s suited to you.
What is it?
Step Forward is a full-time 12-month programme that helps you launch your career, ready yourself for the future and gives you the time to make decisions about what you want to do next. Get paid to do real work for a high quality employer, make new friends and develop the skills you’ll need to get ahead in life.
Who’s it for?
Worried about finding a job after university?
Step Forward allows you to get experience before university to make you more employable when you graduate.
Want a constructive and meaningful Gap Year experience but worried about the cost?
With Step Forward you’ll get paid £9,000 whilst you meet new people and learn new skills transferable to your future decisions.
Want to keep your options open, but don’t know how?
Step Forward will provide you with your own professional mentor who will assist and support you as you determine your path.
Want the independence of working but unsure how to progress in your career?
Step Forward is your opportunity to fast track your future giving you the skills and experience to succeed, and allows you to develop the professional networks you need to get ahead in the world of work.
As a graduate of NCS with The Challenge, you have the exclusive option of applying to Step Forward before others even hear about it.
If this sounds like an option that you want to hear more about, express your interest with your unique form Here.
For more information, please visit www.stepforward.uk.com.
Alternatively, you can apply Now to be considered for our next assessment event in October half term. Step Forward is a competitive programme, and places are limited so avoid missing out on this opportunity by applying as soon as possible.
Best wishes,
WWW.STEPFORWARD.UK.COM /thestepforward
